response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $1,200,000. However, to facilitate a fair transaction, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1,500,000. This exceptional opportunity comes with a comprehensive warranty and dedicated customer support to ensure a smooth integration into your operations.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. I am looking forward to the possibility of working with you and contributing to the growth of your company.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1500000}
